_header: The souls that to purgatory wends
Title(s): ‘Of þe relefyng of saules in purgatory’
_description: ‘Of þe relefyng of saules in purgatory’ — fifteen couplets

BLAdd37049.Note:
Excerpts from the Pricke of Conscience, lines 3566-72, 3586-89,
                    plus six additional lines, 3918-35.

Doty,  Brant Lee,
